experiences.roleDescription:
As a skilled Software Engineer, I have been a valuable contributor to
                the pp.com team. In this role, I have played a key part in building new
                features and implementing marketing tools within an existing
                application. My commitment to quality has made me an integral part
                of the product development process, where I regularly enhance
                existing code, write unit tests, and ensure product quality.
                 In addition to my primary responsibilities, I am also involved in a
                rotational on-call cadence, where I monitor live issues and address
                them as needed. This role has given me the opportunity to develop a
                deep understanding of the product and its users, and has honed my
                skills in problem-solving and critical thinking.
                 Overall, I take pride in my ability to work collaboratively with a team
                while also being an independent problem solver. My dedication to
                excellence, coupled with my technical skills and experience, make me
                a strong candidate for any Software Engineering role.

As a Senior Developer for a Fortune 500 company, I have been
                instrumental in migrating legacy products to new, optimized versions.
                Through my work on this project, I have demonstrated my extensive
                development skills, including writing unit tests and ensuring client
                requirements are met to the highest standard.
                In addition to my technical expertise, I have also taken on a mentorship
                role, working with junior team members to help them develop their
                skills and achieve their goals. As a leader on the team, I have taken an
                active role in organizational activities such as recruitment and training.
                Overall, my commitment to excellence and my ability to lead and
                mentor others make me a valuable asset to any team. My experience
                in legacy product migration, coupled with my technical skills and
                leadership abilities, position me well for any Senior Developer role.

As a Software Engineer, I have a proven track record of successfully redesigning legacy applications to meet modern needs. 
                One such example is my work on an e-commerce solution that offers a one-touch payment gateway, order analytics/tracking, 
                and a simplified deployment process with minimal technical knowledge. I detected several problems with the legacy application 
                and determined that a microservice-based architecture was the optimal solution. Through my work, I successfully designed and 
                implemented a new software architecture that reduced costs by almost 70% and increased turnaround time by almost 90%.
                In addition to the architecture redesign, I also created two services and wrote packages that consumed them. 
                As a DevOps Engineer for the application, I ensured that the application was deployed efficiently and maintained optimal 
                performance. The success of this project has been documented in a use case study, which highlights the benefits of the new 
                architecture and its impact on the e-commerce solution. Through my work on this project, I have demonstrated my technical 
                expertise, problem-solving abilities, and commitment to excellence.Overall, my experience in software architecture redesign, 
                coupled with my technical skills and DevOps expertise, make me a strong candidate for any Software Engineering role. I served 
                as a senior developer on a product that offered a comprehensive solution for all the services provided by the organization. 
                The application maintained client databases and provided a single sign-on feature for all other applications. 
                I also managed payment and subscriptions for clients across all other applications. My responsibilities included 
                leading a team of developers and ensuring timely delivery of features while maintaining high code quality. 
                I designed the architecture and database schema, focused on creating scalable and secure features that provided a 
                seamless experience for end-users. Overall, my contribution has increased the efficiency of the organization's operations, 
                and my experience provided me with invaluable insights into developing robust and scalable applications.

As a software developer, I have contributed to several significant
                projects for the organization, including the reengineering and
                refactoring of legacy products such as the payroll system for
                Government subsidiaries in West Bengal, India. I was also
                responsible for designing and building new, scalable applications to
                cater to mostly government-oriented clients.
                
                In addition to development work, I have also analyzed and prepared
                documentation for projects and products. My experience has enabled
                me to contribute to building new desktop or machine-oriented utility
                tools, which have helped transform regular manual work to a certain
                automation level. This automation has enabled government
                employees to work much faster, and throughputs have increased
                significantly.

                Throughout my tenure, I have focused on delivering high-quality
                solutions that adhere to industry standards and regulations. My
                experience has allowed me to develop a strong understanding of the
                software development lifecycle, and I have contributed to every
                aspect of it, from design to deployment.

Install and configure Windows server. Create Group policies and user
                management on Windows server.
                Install Windows OS in many ways, like network install.
                Writing programming script in Perl.
                Configuring and Managing Cisco Router, Switch. Configuring many
                different topologies.
                Maintain computer networks and related computing environments like
                computer hardware, systems software, applications software, and
                other configurations.
